body:
**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**: BUG REPORT

/kind bug



**What happened**:
- Created a service of type `LoadBalancer` on Azure.
- The service is created successful and a LoadBalancer with public IP is created on Azure.
- kube-controller-manager goes into a crashloop

```
Jun 04 20:08:00 controller1 kube-controller-manager[6143]: I0604 20:08:00.553408    6143 azure_backoff.go:230] PublicIPAddressesClient.List(pixel104) - backoff: success
Jun 04 20:08:00 controller1 kube-controller-manager[6143]: I0604 20:08:00.611308    6143 azure_loadbalancer.go:444] reconcileLoadBalancer(default/nginx) - wantLb(true): started
Jun 04 20:08:00 controller1 kube-controller-manager[6143]: I0604 20:08:00.641296    6143 azure_backoff.go:181] LoadBalancerClient.List(pixel104) - backoff: success
Jun 04 20:08:00 controller1 kube-controller-manager[6143]: I0604 20:08:00.667537    6143 azure_loadbalancer.go:450] reconcileLoadBalancer(default/nginx): lb(pixel104) wantLb(true) resolved load balancer name
Jun 04 20:08:00 controller1 kube-controller-manager[6143]: I0604 20:08:00.784228    6143 azure_backoff.go:62] backoff: success
Jun 04 20:08:00 controller1 kube-controller-manager[6143]: I0604 20:08:00.856423    6143 azure_backoff.go:62] backoff: success
Jun 04 20:08:00 controller1 kube-controller-manager[6143]: I0604 20:08:00.869422    6143 azure_backoff.go:62] backoff: success
Jun 04 20:08:00 controller1 kube-controller-manager[6143]: I0604 20:08:00.882323    6143 azure_backoff.go:62] backoff: success

Jun 04 20:08:01 controller1 kube-controller-manager[6143]: E0604 20:08:01.206862    6143 runtime.go:66] Observed a panic: "invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference" (runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference)
Jun 04 20:08:01 controller1 kube-controller-manager[6143]: /workspace/anago-v1.10.3-beta.0.74+2bba0127d85d5a/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/runtime/runtime.go:72

Jun 04 20:08:01 controller1 kube-controller-manager[6143]: /workspace/anago-v1.10.3-beta.0.74+2bba0127d85d5a/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/wait/wait.go:88

Jun 04 20:08:01 controller1 kube-controller-manager[6143]:         /workspace/anago-v1.10.3-beta.0.74+2bba0127d85d5a/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/wait/wait.go:134 +0xbd
Jun 04 20:08:01 controller1 systemd[1]: kube-controller-manager.service: Main process exited, code=exited, status=2/INVALIDARGUMENT
Jun 04 20:08:01 controller1 kube-controller-manager[6143]: k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/wait.Until(0xc4226aa650, 0x3b9aca00, 0xc42004d740)
Jun 04 20:08:01 controller1 kube-controller-manager[6143]:         /workspace/anago-v1.10.3-beta.0.74+2bba0127d85d5a/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/wait/wait.go:88 +0x4d
Jun 04 20:08:01 controller1 kube-controller-manager[6143]: created by k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/controller/service.(*ServiceController).Run
Jun 04 20:08:01 controller1 kube-controller-manager[6143]:         /workspace/anago-v1.10.3-beta.0.74+2bba0127d85d5a/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/controller/service/service_controller.go:191 +0x20c
Jun 04 20:08:01 controller1 systemd[1]: kube-controller-manager.service: Unit entered failed state.
Jun 04 20:08:01 controller1 systemd[1]: kube-controller-manager.service: Failed with result 'exit-code'.
```

**What you expected to happen**: LoadBalancer service receives public IP and is available for traffic

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**: 
- provision a loadbalancer service on Azure with v1.10.3.


**Anything else we need to know?**:

**Environment**: 
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`):
```
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"10", GitVersion:"v1.10.3", GitCommit:"2bba0127d85d5a46ab4b778548be28623b32d0b0", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-05-21T09:17:39Z", GoVersion:"go1.9.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"10", GitVersion:"v1.10.3", GitCommit:"2bba0127d85d5a46ab4b778548be28623b32d0b0", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-05-21T09:05:37Z", GoVersion:"go1.9.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration: Azure
- OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release):
```
NAME="Ubuntu"
VERSION="16.04.4 LTS (Xenial Xerus)"
ID=ubuntu
ID_LIKE=debian
PRETTY_NAME="Ubuntu 16.04.4 LTS"
VERSION_ID="16.04"
HOME_URL="http://www.ubuntu.com/"
SUPPORT_URL="http://help.ubuntu.com/"
BUG_REPORT_URL="http://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/"
VERSION_CODENAME=xenial
UBUNTU_CODENAME=xenial
```
- Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`):
```
Linux controller1 4.13.0-1018-azure #21-Ubuntu SMP Thu May 17 13:58:38 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
```
- Install tools:
- Others:

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

title: v1.10.3 kube-controller-manager crashes after Azure provisioning load balancer
